properties.Title: Hardened
properties.Text: Oregon’s forests are designed to burn; our homes don’t have to be. Still standing after the 2020 wildfires, some Oregon homes point to a future of coexistence with fire.

properties.Title: Beautiful and Dammed
properties.Text: Rivers like the McKenzie have always been integral to the Pacific Northwest, and dams that have been built across many of its rivers are inseparable from its modern history.
